description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Take on wave after wave of Mutants! By 2030 nuclear waste has mutated many locals, who have taken over a military base; and its your job to clean them up!  Unlock Assault Rifles, a Submachine Gun, a Shotgun, Health depot's and Ammunition bunkers to help get the job done! 80 point FPS with all the doors blown off!
